name: voxscribe
title: Voxscribe
description: VoxScribe is a powerful Raycast extension that transforms spoken words into written text with ease. This tool bridges the gap between audio and text, allowing users to quickly convert voice recordings or podcasts into editable text format.
author: g3ge

preferences.name: deepgramApiKey
preferences.title: Deepgram API Key
preferences.description: Your Deepgram API key from deepgram.com/console

preferences.name: deepgramModel
preferences.title: Transcription Model
preferences.description: AI model optimized for different audio types and use cases

data.title: Nova 2 Phone Call (Optimized for Phone Calls)

preferences.name: smartFormat
preferences.title: Smart Formatting
preferences.description: Automatically add punctuation, capitalization, and formatting
preferences.label: Enable smart formatting

preferences.name: detectLanguage
preferences.title: Language Detection
preferences.description: Automatically detect and transcribe in the spoken language
preferences.label: Enable automatic language detection

preferences.name: maxChunkSizeMB
preferences.title: Max Audio Chunk Size
preferences.description: Maximum size per audio chunk (MB). Smaller chunks process faster but may reduce accuracy at boundaries

preferences.name: autoOpenTranscription
preferences.title: Auto-Open Results
preferences.description: Automatically display transcription results when processing completes
preferences.label: Auto-open transcription results

preferences.name: defaultCopyFormat
preferences.title: Default Copy Action
preferences.description: Choose what gets copied to clipboard by default

preferences.name: enableAudioValidation
preferences.title: Audio File Validation
preferences.description: Validate audio files before processing to prevent errors
preferences.label: Enable pre-processing audio validation

preferences.name: historyLimit
preferences.title: Transcription History Limit
preferences.description: Maximum number of transcriptions to keep in history

preferences.name: showDetailedProgress
preferences.title: Detailed Progress Display
preferences.description: Show detailed progress information during transcription
preferences.label: Show detailed processing stages and progress

preferences.name: notificationLevel
preferences.title: Notification Level
preferences.description: Choose when to show system notifications

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
